description: This is the main activity class for an Android app that displays current geographic coordinates and local time. It manages location permissions, observes UI state via ViewModel, and renders the user interface with Jetpack Compose components, including refresh functionality and error handling.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main entry point of the Android app, handling location permission requests and displaying location/time info.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI, permission handling, and observes UI state.
